verses.name: Ezra 2:6
verses.text: The children of Pahath–moab, of the children of Jeshua and Joab, two thousand eight hundred and twelve.

verses.name: Ezra 2:7
verses.text: The children of Elam, a thousand two hundred fifty and four.

verses.name: Ezra 2:8
verses.text: The children of Zattu, nine hundred forty and five.

verses.name: Ezra 2:9
verses.text: The children of Zaccai, seven hundred and threescore.

verses.name: Ezra 2:10
verses.text: The children of Bani, six hundred forty and two.

verses.name: Ezra 2:11
verses.text: The children of Bebai, six hundred twenty and three.

verses.name: Ezra 2:12
verses.text: The children of Azgad, a thousand two hundred twenty and two.

verses.name: Ezra 2:13
verses.text: The children of Adonikam, six hundred sixty and six.

verses.name: Ezra 2:14
verses.text: The children of Bigvai, two thousand fifty and six.
